Looking at the Chart Window

The Chart window displays only after you create a chart. To do this, click a component tab, display data in the upper pane, select Charts from the component menu, specify the type of chart you wish to view, and complete the Chart dialog.

 

Title Bar

The title bar at the top of the main window shows the following information:

  • Product name

  • Name of the chart

Menu Bar

In the Windows client, the Chart menu bar shows Project, View, Folder, Tools, Window, and Help menu items. Each of these menus contains the standard StarTeam default options.

Note: The Cross-Platform client does not display the standard StarTeam Help menu items.

Toolbar

The Chart window has its own, unique toolbar. For more information on the toolbar and its features, see Using the Chart Window Toolbar.

Palette Bar

In the Windows client, by default, the palette bar appears immediately under the Chart window toolbar. The colors on the bar can be applied to non-text elements of the chart.

Note: The Palette Bar is not available in the Chart window of the Cross-Platform client.

Chart Contents

The type of chart and its display vary considerably, according to your choices. The chart can include not only data but one or more titles, legends, series legends, and vertical or horizontal grids.
